column1: Art Institute of Chicago////One thing I wish the Institute would embrace more is the desire for interactive exhibits.  Children and adults alike
column2: especially if they are tactile-inclined or are visually impaired
column3: literally have nothing they will connect with as much as others in the museum
column4: and that seems like a massive oversight given the prominence and prestige of the Institute.  I have to believe something can be done in the massive space of the Institute to mitigate this.
